snippet: Top-seeded Novak Djokovic lost to 16th-seeded Tommy Robredo, 7-6 (6), 7-5, in the Round of 16 at the Western & Southern Open in Mason, Ohio.
abstract: Tommy Robredo defeats Novak Djokovic at Western & Southern Open tennis tournament Round of 16.
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Novak Djokovic lost to 16th-seeded Tommy Robredo, 7-6 (6), 7-5, in the Round of 16 at the Western & Southern Open in Mason, Ohio.
